ModMetaData.name: More Restrictions On Psycast Paths - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Taggerung
ModMetaData.description: Restrict VE Psycast paths to specific Xenotypes (This is the dev version of MoreRestrictionsOnPsycastPaths. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
